items.content_html: Yeah! We (Wimbledon) won, John Green was in attendance and said he likes our podcast plus I had a great evening at Batesford Boys 50th anniversary meal yesterday at Plough Lane too. Yes I had a fall asleep on train pain (don’t ask) BUT It’s a weird and wonderful weekend! COYD
items.content_text: Yeah! We (Wimbledon) won, John Green was in attendance and said he likes our podcast plus I had a great evening at Batesford Boys 50th anniversary meal yesterday at Plough Lane too. Yes I had a fall asleep on train pain (don’t ask) BUT It’s a weird and wonderful weekend! COYD

items.content_html: I can’t believe it one of my main and only now frequent podcasts I religiously listen to anymore on the tech side is Core Intuition has ended. Gutted it was one of the few that has stayed true to being “real” gonna miss @manton and @danielpunkass chatting indeed!
items.content_text: I can’t believe it one of my main and only now frequent podcasts I religiously listen to anymore on the tech side is Core Intuition has ended. Gutted it was one of the few that has stayed true to being “real” gonna miss [@manton](https://micro.blog/manton) and [@danielpunkass](https://micro.blog/danielpunkass) chatting indeed!

items.content_html: Dam it Core Intuition podcast has ended - gutted - thanks for all the episodes @manton @danielpunkass

items.content_html: My new Playdate game is out now as part of Global Game Jam 2025 - check it out on itch.io - adamprocter.itch.io/capture-c… 👾

items.content_html: Switched up to the sw smart card for trains over Trainline app as there are suggested savings aka no booking fees. Using uber for my football trains now too as gain credits. I am trying to get money savvy for 2025. Will I miss trainline app end of year review maybe 🤔 😂

items.content_html: Having my own VPS these days seems like an expense I don’t need… I guess I’m just an old internet person who likes to have his own server for stuff and mucking about. It does still run things for me I need / want but I suspect an actual plan could see monthly costs reduce 🤪🤦🤷😜
